languages.text: All allies, including the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerTacticianGlossary}Master Tactician{/g}, that have a weapon capable of {g|Encyclopedia:BurstAttacksGlossary}burst{/g} attacks use a burst attack instead of a single attack against enemies as part of Orchestrated Firestorm and Last Volley. Until the beginning of the Master Tactician's next turn, allies automatically {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} all {g|Encyclopedia:FriendlyFire}friendly fire{/g}.
languages.original_text: {g|Encyclopedia:CareerTacticianGlossary}Мастер-тактик{/g} и все его союзники, оружие которых позволяет стрелять {g|Encyclopedia:BurstAttacksGlossary}очередью{/g}, стреляют очередью вместо совершения одиночных атак во время Направленного шквала и Последнего рывка. До начала следующего хода мастера-тактика все союзники автоматически {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}уклоняются{/g} от любых атак союзников.

traits.locale_text: All allies, including the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerTacticianGlossary}Master Tactician{/g}, that have a weapon capable of {g|Encyclopedia:BurstAttacksGlossary}burst{/g} attacks use a burst attack instead of a single attack against enemies as part of Orchestrated Firestorm and Last Volley. Until the beginning of the Master Tactician's next turn, allies automatically {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} all {g|Encyclopedia:FriendlyFire}friendly fire{/g}.

All allies, including the Tactician, that have a weapon capable of Burst Fire, use Burst Fire instead of a Single Shot to attack enemies as part of Directed Firestorm and Last Volley. Until the beginning of the Tactician's next turn, all friendly fire is automatically dodged by allies.

All allies, including the Tactician, that have a weapon capable of burst fire use burst fire instead of a single shot to attack enemies as part of Directed Firestorm and Last Volley. Until the beginning of the Tactician's next turn, allies automatically dodge all friendly fire.

All allies, including the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerTacticianGlossary}Master Tactician{/g}, that have a weapon capable of {g|Encyclopedia:BurstAttacksGlossary}burst{/g} attacks use a burst attack instead of a single attack against enemies as part of Orchestrated Firestorm and Last Volley. Until the beginning of the Master Tactician's next turn, allies automatically {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} all {g|Encyclopedia:FriendlyFire}friendly fire{/g}.

languages.text: {g|Encyclopedia:CareerTacticianGlossary}Мастер-тактик{/g} и все его союзники, оружие которых позволяет совершать атаки {g|Encyclopedia:BurstAttacksGlossary}очередью{/g}, совершают атаки очередью вместо одиночных атак во время Направленного шквала и Последнего рывка. До начала следующего хода мастера-тактика все союзники автоматически {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}уклоняются{/g} от любых атак союзников.
languages.original_text: All allies, including the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerTacticianGlossary}Master Tactician{/g}, that have a weapon capable of {g|Encyclopedia:BurstAttacksGlossary}burst{/g} fire use burst fire instead of a single attack against enemies as part of Orchestrated Firestorm and Last Volley. Until the beginning of the Master Tactician's next turn, allies automatically {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} all {g|Encyclopedia:FriendlyFire}friendly fire{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Тактик и все его союзники, оружие которых позволяет стрелять очередью, стреляют очередью вместо одиночных выстрелов во время Направленного шквала и Последнего рывка. До начала следующего {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}хода{/g} тактика все союзники автоматически уклоняются от любых атак союзников.

Тактик и все его союзники, оружие которых позволяет стрелять очередью, стреляют очередью вместо одиночных выстрелов во время Направленного шквала и Последнего рывка. До начала следующего {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}хода{/g} тактика все союзники автоматически уклоняются от любых атак союзников.

languages.text: 枪炮奏鸣与最终齐射期间，包括{g|Encyclopedia:CareerTacticianGlossary}战术专家{/g}在内，所有使用{g|Encyclopedia:BurstAttacksGlossary}连发{/g}攻击武器的盟友都可以使用连发攻击（而非单发攻击）来攻击敌人。所有盟友都会自动{g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}闪避{/g}所有{g|Encyclopedia:FriendlyFire}友军炮火{/g}，直到战术专家的下个回合开始。
languages.original_text: All allies, including the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerTacticianGlossary}Master Tactician{/g}, that have a weapon capable of {g|Encyclopedia:BurstAttacksGlossary}burst{/g} attacks use a burst attack instead of a single attack against enemies as part of Orchestrated Firestorm and Last Volley. Until the beginning of the Master Tactician's next turn, allies automatically {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} all {g|Encyclopedia:FriendlyFire}friendly fire{/g}.

traits.locale_text: 枪炮奏鸣与最终齐射期间，包括{g|Encyclopedia:CareerTacticianGlossary}战术专家{/g}在内，所有使用{g|Encyclopedia:BurstAttacksGlossary}连发{/g}武器的盟友都可以使用连发模式（而非单发模式）来攻击敌人。所有盟友都会自动{g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}闪避{/g}所有{g|Encyclopedia:FriendlyFire}友军炮火{/g}，直到战术专家的下个回合开始。

枪炮奏鸣与最终齐射期间，包括{g|Encyclopedia:CareerTacticianGlossary}战术专家{/g}在内，所有使用{g|Encyclopedia:BurstAttacksGlossary}连发{/g}武器的盟友都可以使用连发模式（而非单发模式）来攻击敌人。所有盟友都会自动{g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}闪避{/g}所有{g|Encyclopedia:FriendlyFire}友军炮火{/g}，直到战术专家的下个{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}回合{/g}开始。

languages.text: Todos los aliados (incluido el {g|Encyclopedia:CareerTacticianGlossary}maestro táctico{/g}) que tengan un arma capaz de lanzar ataques de {g|Encyclopedia:BurstAttacksGlossary}ráfaga{/g} usarán ráfagas en vez de efectuar un solo disparo para atacar a sus enemigos como parte de Tormenta de fuego coordinada y Salva final. Hasta el comienzo del próximo turno del maestro táctico, sus aliados {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}esquivan{/g} automáticamente todo el {g|Encyclopedia:FriendlyFire}fuego amigo{/g}.
languages.original_text: All allies, including the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerTacticianGlossary}Master Tactician{/g}, that have a weapon capable of {g|Encyclopedia:BurstAttacksGlossary}burst{/g} attacks use a burst attack instead of a single attack against enemies as part of Orchestrated Firestorm and Last Volley. Until the beginning of the Master Tactician's next turn, allies automatically {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} all {g|Encyclopedia:FriendlyFire}friendly fire{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Todos los aliados (incluido el {g|Encyclopedia:CareerTacticianGlossary}maestro táctico{/g}) que tengan un arma capaz de lanzar ataques de {g|Encyclopedia:BurstAttacksGlossary}ráfaga{/g} usarán ráfagas en vez de efectuar un solo disparo para atacar a sus enemigos como parte de Tormenta de fuego coordinada y Salva final. Hasta el comienzo del próximo turno del maestro táctico, sus aliados {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}esquivan{/g} automáticamente todo el {g|Encyclopedia:FriendlyFire}fuego amigo{/g}.

Todos los aliados (incluido el {g|Encyclopedia:CareerTacticianGlossary}maestro táctico{/g}) que tengan un arma capaz de disparar {g|Encyclopedia:BurstAttacksGlossary}ráfagas{/g} usarán este modo en vez de efectuar un solo disparo para atacar a sus enemigos como parte de Tormenta de fuego coordinada y Salva final. Hasta el comienzo del próximo {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turno{/g} del maestro táctico, sus aliados {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}esquivan{/g} automáticamente todo el {g|Encyclopedia:FriendlyFire}fuego amigo{/g}.

languages.text: Sämtliche Verbündeten, einschließlich des {g|Encyclopedia:CareerTacticianGlossary}Meistertaktikers{/g}, die mit ihren Waffen {g|Encyclopedia:BurstAttacksGlossary}Salven{/g}angriffe ausführen können, nutzen als Teil von Geplanter Feuersturm und Letzte Salve diese Salvenangriffe anstatt eines Einzelangriffs. Bis zum Beginn des nächsten Zugs des Meistertaktikers {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}weichen{/g} Verbündete automatisch jedem {g|Encyclopedia:FriendlyFire}Eigenbeschuss{/g} aus.
languages.original_text: All allies, including the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerTacticianGlossary}Master Tactician{/g}, that have a weapon capable of {g|Encyclopedia:BurstAttacksGlossary}burst{/g} attacks use a burst attack instead of a single attack against enemies as part of Orchestrated Firestorm and Last Volley. Until the beginning of the Master Tactician's next turn, allies automatically {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} all {g|Encyclopedia:FriendlyFire}friendly fire{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Sämtliche Verbündeten, einschließlich des {g|Encyclopedia:CareerTacticianGlossary}Meistertaktikers{/g}, die mit ihren Waffen {g|Encyclopedia:BurstAttacksGlossary}Salvenfeuer{/g} anstatt {g|Encyclopedia:SingleRangedAttacksGlossary}Einzelschüssen{/g} verschießen können, nutzen als Teil von Gezielter Feuersturm und Letzte Salve Salvenfeuer. Bis zum Beginn des nächsten {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}Zugs{/g} des Meistertaktikers {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}weichen{/g} Verbündete automatisch jedem {g|Encyclopedia:FriendlyFire}Eigenbeschuss{/g} aus.

Sämtliche Verbündeten, einschließlich des {g|Encyclopedia:CareerTacticianGlossary}Meistertaktikers{/g}, die mit ihren Waffen {g|Encyclopedia:BurstAttacksGlossary}Salvenfeuer{/g} verschießen können, nutzen als Teil von Geplanter Feuersturm und Letzte Salve Salvenfeuer anstatt eines Einzelangriffs. Bis zum Beginn des nächsten {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}Zugs{/g} des Meistertaktikers {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}weichen{/g} Verbündete automatisch jedem {g|Encyclopedia:FriendlyFire}Eigenbeschuss{/g} aus.

languages.text: Tous les alliés, y compris le {g|Encyclopedia:CareerTacticianGlossary}maître tacticien{/g}, qui disposent d'une arme capable d'infliger une attaque en {g|Encyclopedia:BurstAttacksGlossary}rafale{/g} utilisent cette dernière plutôt que l'attaque au coup par coup pour attaquer les ennemis lors de Tempête de feu dirigée et Dernière salve. Jusqu'au début du tour suivant du maître tacticien, les alliés {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}esquivent{/g} automatiquement tous les {g|Encyclopedia:FriendlyFire}tirs alliés{/g}.
languages.original_text: All allies, including the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerTacticianGlossary}Master Tactician{/g}, that have a weapon capable of {g|Encyclopedia:BurstAttacksGlossary}burst{/g} attacks use a burst attack instead of a single attack against enemies as part of Orchestrated Firestorm and Last Volley. Until the beginning of the Master Tactician's next turn, allies automatically {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} all {g|Encyclopedia:FriendlyFire}friendly fire{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Tous les alliés, y compris le {g|Encyclopedia:CareerTacticianGlossary}maître tacticien{/g}, qui disposent d'une arme capable d'infliger une attaque en {g|Encyclopedia:BurstAttacksGlossary}rafale{/g} utilisent cette dernière plutôt que l'attaque au coup par coup pour attaquer les ennemis lors de Tempête de feu dirigée et Dernière salve. Jusqu'au début du tour suivant du maître tacticien, les alliés {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}esquivent{/g} automatiquement tous les {g|Encyclopedia:FriendlyFire}tirs alliés{/g}.

Tous les alliés, y compris le {g|Encyclopedia:CareerTacticianGlossary}Maître Tacticien{/g}, qui disposent d'une arme capable de tirer {g|Encyclopedia:BurstAttacksGlossary}en rafale{/g} utilisent le tir en rafale plutôt que le tir au coup par coup pour attaquer les ennemis dans le cadre de Tempête de Feu Dirigée et de Dernière Salve. Jusqu'au début du {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}tour{/g} suivant du Maître Tacticien, les alliés {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}esquivent{/g} automatiquement tous les {g|Encyclopedia:FriendlyFire}tirs amis{/g}.

Tous les alliés, y compris le {g|Encyclopedia:CareerTacticianGlossary}maître tacticien{/g}, qui disposent d'une arme capable d'infliger une attaque en {g|Encyclopedia:BurstAttacksGlossary}rafale{/g} utilisent cette dernière plutôt que l'attaque au coup par coup pour attaquer les ennemis lors de Tempête de feu dirigée et Dernière salve. Jusqu'au début du tour suivant du maître tacticien, les alliés {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}esquivent{/g} automatiquement tous les {g|Encyclopedia:FriendlyFire}tirs alliés{/g}.

languages.text: {g|Encyclopedia:BurstAttacksGlossary}バースト{/g}攻撃が可能な武器を持つ、{g|Encyclopedia:CareerTacticianGlossary}戦略の達人{/g}を含む全ての味方は、うねるファイアストームと最後の斉射での攻撃時に、単発射撃ではなくバースト射撃を使用する。戦略の達人の次のターン開始まで、味方はすべての{g|Encyclopedia:FriendlyFire}同士討ち{/g}を自動的に{g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}回避{/g}する。
languages.original_text: All allies, including the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerTacticianGlossary}Master Tactician{/g}, that have a weapon capable of {g|Encyclopedia:BurstAttacksGlossary}burst{/g} attacks use a burst attack instead of a single attack against enemies as part of Orchestrated Firestorm and Last Volley. Until the beginning of the Master Tactician's next turn, allies automatically {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} all {g|Encyclopedia:FriendlyFire}friendly fire{/g}.

traits.locale_text: {g|Encyclopedia:BurstAttacks}バースト{/g}射撃が可能な武器を持つ、戦術家を含む全ての味方は、炎嵐の指揮と最後の斉射での攻撃時に、{g|Encyclopedia:SingleRangedAttacks}単発射撃{/g}ではなくバースト射撃を使用する。戦術家の次の{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ターン{/g}開始まで、味方はすべての{g|Encyclopedia:FriendlyFire}同士討ち{/g}を自動的に{g|Encyclopedia:Dodge}回避{/g}する。
